title: Wabi Sabi Noodle House
description: This is a Japanese vegetarian noodle house. Offers three main noodle dishes, three kinds of side dishes, and steamed vegetarian buns. Sells various packaged vegetarian products at the side. Mock meat is used in the meals. Cozy atmosphere, inside Makati's The Collective. Reported open March 2013 by happycow member.
streetAddress: 7274 Malugay St, Brgy. San Antonio, Makati City
